mapper.select: SELECT id, file_name AS fileName, file_path AS filePath, parent_path AS parentPath, file_size AS fileSize, fileType, network_share_location AS networkShareLocation, last_modify AS lastModify, sync_time AS syncTime, statis_date AS statisDate, is_directory AS isDirectory FROM mss_file WHERE network_share_location = #{networkShareLocation} AND parent_path = #{parentPath} ORDER BY is_directory DESC, file_name ASC
